name: Roofing Insulation

hero.title: Roofing Insulation
hero.description: Efficient solution for thermal insulation in roofs, ensuring comfort and energy savings.

categoryDescription.title: Isoart Roofing Insulation offers excellent thermal performance, lightness and ease of installation for roofs.
categoryDescription.description: Isoart Roofing Insulation is an innovative solution for roofs that seek energy efficiency and thermal comfort. Produced with high-quality expanded polystyrene, it provides superior thermal insulation, reduced air conditioning costs and simple installation, being ideal for residential and commercial projects that value sustainability and comfort.

benefits.title: Superior thermal insulation
benefits.description: Significantly reduces heat transfer, providing thermal comfort.

benefits.title: Energy savings
benefits.description: Reduces air conditioning and heating costs by up to 30%.

benefits.title: Simple installation
benefits.description: Easy application between tiles and roof structure.

generalCharacteristics: Moisture resistance with maximum absorption of 4%
Available in different thicknesses for each need

applications.title: Ideal solution for thermal insulation in residential and commercial roofs
applications.description: Isoart Roofing Insulation is perfect for roofs that seek energy efficiency and thermal comfort. With simple installation and high performance, it is ideal for houses, apartments, businesses and warehouses that value sustainability and economy.

tabDescriptions.Thermal insulation: With thermal conductivity coefficient of 0.028 Kcal/h.m.°C, roofing insulation significantly reduces heat transfer, ensuring thermal comfort and energy savings.
tabDescriptions.Ease of installation: The system is designed for simple installation between tiles and roof structure, without need for complex structural modifications.
tabDescriptions.Versatility: Available in different thicknesses (30mm to 100mm), insulation adapts to specific needs of each project and climatic region.
tabDescriptions.Sustainability: 100% recyclable and CFC-free, Isoart roofing insulation is an environmentally responsible solution for sustainable construction.
